name: 3D Jet-Fighter Air-Plane Flying Simulator Game - Real Modern Sim Racing Games
name_original: 3D Jet-Fighter Air-Plane Flying Simulator Game - Real Modern Sim Racing Games
description:
Are you ready to rule the skies? For that you’ll need a quick eye and an ability to make split second decisions. Get behind the steers of some of the top class jet fighters, start your engines and get ready for a fight. You’ll have to dodge incoming rockets while trying to shoot down enemies’ airplanes. Your aircraft will be well equipped with latest weapons so if you combine that with some jet fighter skills, you might be able to cheat the death and save the world. Are you up for a challenge?

Game features:

- Countless hours of nerve-racking fun
- Highly intelligent opponents
- 1000s’ of pilots competing. Can you beat the all?
- Open environment
- HD graphics
